title: 9: The Spheres
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: Medieval man is much maligned for his cosmology. This episode describes this cosmology, helping the modern reader to understand references to the spheres in Milton and others, while at the same time defending medieval man.
itunes:author: A.J. & Graeme
itunes:subtitle: A defense of medieval man.
itunes:summary: Medieval man is much maligned for his cosmology. This episode describes this cosmology, helping the modern reader to understand references to the spheres in Milton and others, while at the same time defending medieval man.
itunes:title: 9: The Spheres
